article.title: Connect the Stars — An endless movie trivia game
article.author: Eric Bai
article.excerpt: If you enjoy answering "What movies was she in?" and "Who was in that movie again?", you'll enjoy this game!

authors.bio: A Canadian software engineer in New York. I watch a lot of movies.
authors.name: Eric Bai
